GOAL FOUND!

Solution

(1,3) -> (2,3)
(2,3) -> (1,2)
(1,2) -> (2,2)
(2,2) -> (3,1)
(3,1) -> (4,2)
(4,2) -> (4,3)
(4,3) -> (5,3)
